description.narrative:
Context: In 2021 communal, regional and legislative elections will take place in Morocco, in a context of rising social conflicts and repression of the freedom of expression and high prison sentences of activists, journalists and social movement leaders. A commission created by the King to revise the development model will deliver their findings in June 2020, in this context Oxfam Morocco strives to use this opportunity for advocacy and raising awareness around inequality in Morocco. The project therefore will advance theimplementation of fiscal justice campaigns, raise awareness of decision makers on inequality to take urgent measures to reduce social inequality, and extend the debate and mobilisation of other local and regional actors to increase pressure on the topic of inequalities.
Activities: This shall be through a high-level public debate on fiscal evasion, dialogue spaces around the finance law of 2021,formations/sensibilisations of journalists on inequalities, and capacity building on techniques of influencing campaigns.

mailing-address.narrative: PO box 30919, 2500 GX The Hague, The Netherlands

sector.narrative: The right to social and political participation
